title: Rapha’s Latest Maghalie Rochette Collab Inspired By ‘Pre-Race Emotions’
content:
Three-time Canadian and Pan American Cyclo-cross champion, Maghalie Rochette, has collaborated with Rapha on a third limited-edition collection of Pro Team racewear.

The post Rapha’s Latest Maghalie Rochette Collab Inspired By ‘Pre-Race Emotions’ appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Andrew McLemore
